title: MD
biography: Narendra Prasad Misra was an Indian physician known for his pivotal role during the Bhopal gas tragedy and his contributions to medical education. Originally from Gwalior, he lived in Bhopal in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh.
aiSummary: N. P. Misra is a brain tumor management specialist with an H-index of 18 at Neurosurgery (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Regional Health - Southeast Asia, World Journal of Stem Cells, Journal of the Indian Institute of Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
